title: [Skin Concept] Kog'Meow
body:
So, I had the following light-side/dark-side debate in my head about 20 minutes ago:

{{champion:10}} If there was one champion to recommend a nooby to start off with, who would it be?
{{champion:25}} Kog'maw
{{champion:10}} That's a weird pick.
{{champion:25}} Yeah, but he's easy. You buy recurve bows, stand in one spot, and vomit on people.
{{champion:10}} Yeah, but try explaining that pet creepisoid as the first experience to someone just starting this game.
{{champion:25}} It's simple, "He's like a pet cat turned south in a Resident Evil film."
{{champion:10}} What pet cat mass-produces vomi- oh wait...
{{champion:25}} Exactly, the virus gives it mass-produced projectile furballs.
{{champion:10}} Giggity.
{{champion:25}} Kog'maw cat skin confirmed... and I know what we're calling it.

replies.body: What, you don't want a full skin line? How dare you...
